name: Strange Morning in the Woods
description:
An about 6 minutes long RPG based on a spoiler-free scene from a story I've been working on! Made by one person in two months for a school project, so it's not a full-fledged game, but basically a demo or a snippet from the middle of what would be a full length one.

The protagonist, Kris, wakes up in the woods after a rough night, and has to deal with a huge maned wolf that appeared when the sun went down and just won't leave her alone.
